data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Monterrey throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Monterrey take a 0-1 lead thanks to Aviles Hurtado.
In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Monterrey drive forward but Vincent Janssen is judged offside.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mazatlan's Luis Mendoza misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Can Mazatlan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monterrey's half?
Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 13, Mazatlan's Camilo Sanvezzo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Mazatlan. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Mazatlan.
In the minute 17, Eric Cantu for Monterrey has been booked by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo and receives a first yellow card.
In Mazatlan, Cesar Huerta (Mazatlan) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 20, At Estadio de Mazatlan, Angel Zapata has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Mazatlan are coming forward and Camilo Sanvezzo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 22, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Throw-in Mazatlan.
Mazatlan's Martin Rodriguez breaks free at Estadio de Mazatlan. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mazatlan.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
Celso Ortiz for Monterrey gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 30, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
In the minute 33, Monterrey's Aviles Hurtado has been booked in Mazatlan.
Nicolas Diaz is booked for the home team.
In the minute 35, Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 36, Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Monterrey's Nicolas Sanchez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Penalty! Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo points to the spot, great chance for Monterrey...
In the minute 41, Monterrey are going well in Mazatlan. They now lead 0-2 thanks to a Nicolas Sanchez penalty.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Mazatlan.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Mazatlan.
The first-half has come to a close in Mazatlan.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Shayr Mohamed.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Antonio Mohamed is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de Mazatlan with Maximiliano Meza replacing Shayr Mohamed.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Arturo Gonzalez is on a sub for Angel Zapata for Monterrey.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Monterrey.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Mazatlan's Cesar Huerta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Camilo Sanvezzo (Mazatlan) has received a yellow card from Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Mazatlan Monterrey attack through Maximiliano Meza. The finish is off target, however.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mazatlan.
Goal! Mazatlan reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Camilo Sanvezzo.
In the minute 57, Martin Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
Martin Rodriguez of Mazatlan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Monterrey a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vincent Janssen for Monterrey is whistled offside.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mazatlan.
Throw-in high up the field for Monterrey in Mazatlan.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for Mazatlan, close to Monterrey's area.
In the minute 66, Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Miguel Layun with Matias Kranevitter.
Mazatlan drives forward and Cesar Huerta gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 67, In Mazatlan Monterrey's Maximiliano Meza is caught offside.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 73, Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Rodrigo Millar is replacing Martin Rodriguez for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Matias Kranevitter for Monterrey has been booked by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Mazatlan have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team have replaced Aviles Hurtado with Rogelio Funes Mori. This is the fourth substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
In the minute 80, Candido Ramirez is replacing Luis Mendoza for the home team.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 82, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 86, Francisco Palencia (Mazatlan) is making a third substitution, with Carlos Vargas replacing Mario Osuna.
Mazatlan make their fourth substitution with Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal replacing Israel Jimenez.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Miguel Sansores is replacing Cesar Huerta for the home team.
Can Mazatlan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Mazatlan's Camilo Sanvezzo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 89, Monterrey have a goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Monterrey throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Throw-in Monterrey.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mazatlan defender.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Monterrey needs to be cautious. Mazatlan have an attacking throw-in.
Monterrey will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Mazatlan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mazatlan's Camilo Sanvezzo breaks free at Estadio de Mazatlan. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Mazatlan. The final score is 1-2.
Antonio Mohamed is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio de Mazatlan with Luis Sanchez replacing Vincent Janssen.
